name: Yeah, I think an action extension for save for later makes perfect sense. The hardest part is that it adds a lot of extra configuration steps in Indigenous. That said, I think it’s likely worth it! So useful!

content.html: Yeah, I think an action extension for save for later makes perfect sense. The hardest part is that it adds a lot of extra configuration steps in Indigenous. That said, I think it’s likely worth it! So useful!
